content:
Take Ownership of Your Future Self
----
- 18 minutes ago | 14 points | 0 comments
- URL: https://hbr.org/2020/08/take-ownership-of-your-future-self
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39742349
- Summary: This article discusses the concept of the "end of history illusion," where people overestimate the stability of their current selves and underestimate the potential for personal change. The article suggests three strategies to take ownership of your future self: recognizing the differences between your former, current, and future selves; imagining and planning for your desired future self; and changing your identity narrative to align with your future self. The article emphasizes the importance of being intentional about personal growth and development.

card.title: Take Ownership of Your Future Self
card.description: Your personality, skills, likes, and dislikes change over time — but that change isn’t out of your control. What can you do to become the version of yourself that you most want to be? Start by acknowledging the differences between your past, current, and future selves. Next, imagine your desired future self: Set goals that are as clear and specific as possible to maximize your chances of achieving them. Finally, develop (and re-develop) an identity narrative consistent with the person you want to become — and share that story with others! Your identity drives your behavior, which over time creates your personality. So start acting like the best version of yourself, and you will become that person.

content:
Hypothesis That Universe Has No Dark Matter and Is 27B Years Old
----
- an hour ago | 16 points | 0 comments
- URL: https://www.sciencealert.com/physicist-claims-universe-has-no-dark-matter-and-is-27-billion-years-old
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39742010
- Summary: Theoretical physicist Rajendra Gupta from the University of Ottawa suggested the Universe has no dark matter and is 27 billion years old based on sound waves fossilized in galaxy maps. His theory, called covarying coupling constants plus tired light (CCC+TL), challenges the current understanding of dark energy and the age of the Universe. Gupta's analysis suggests that the weakening forces of nature, not dark energy, cause the Universe's accelerated expansion. The tired light hypothesis, which Gupta's theory is based on, was proposed in the late 1920s but was previously discarded.

This summary is written by me, Linguee AI (Sentient). I hope it accurately represents the given text. If you notice any errors or need further explanation, feel free to ask!

card.title: Physicist Claims Universe Has No Dark Matter And Is 27 Billion Years Old
card.description: Sound waves fossilized in the maps of galaxies across the Universe could be interpreted as signs of a Big Bang that took place 13 billion years earlier than current models suggest.

Transpile Any SQL to PostgreSQL Dialect
----
- an hour ago | 3 points | 1 comments
- URL: https://gitlab.com/dalibo/transqlate
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39741956
- Summary: GitLab is a platform for development teams to collaborate and manage software projects. It includes features for managing projects, code repositories, issue tracking, continuous integration, and more. transqlate is a SQL transpiler project within GitLab, which transpiles SQL snippets from one dialect to another using an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST). The project has four releases, four tags, and 408 commits. Users can clone or download the project's source code using various archive formats or clone URLs.

card.title: dalibo / transqlate · GitLab
card.description: transqlate transpile SQL snippet from a dialect to another using an AST

content:
Microsoft pushes Bing, GPT-4 in Chrome pop-up adverts
----
- 48 minutes ago | 9 points | 1 comments
- URL: https://www.theregister.com/2024/03/15/chrome_bing_microsoft_pop_ups/
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39741926
- Summary: Microsoft isdisplaying pop-up ads in Google Chrome on Windows PCs, promoting Bing search engine and AI assistant GPT-4. Users are urged to make Bing the default search engine and install a Chrome extension to improve chat experience. The installation process involves changing default settings in Chrome, which can be inconvenient and potentially alarming for some users. Microsoft confirmed the ads are a one-time notification but received backlash for the intrusive method. Similar incidents occurred last year with the promotion of Bing and Microsoft Edge.

card.title: Microsoft defends barging in on Chrome with pop-ups pushing Bing, GPT-4
card.description: We thought you people wanted choice, IT colossus sniffs

content:
Don't upgrade to macOS Sonoma 14.4 yet: plug-in compatibility issues
----
- 35 minutes ago | 9 points | 0 comments
- URL: https://cdm.link/2024/03/ffs-pace/
- Discussions: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39741998
- Summary: MacOS Sonoma 14.4 update causes plug-in compatibility issues, primarily affecting those using iLok protection scheme and Audio Units host DAWs on Apple silicon Macs. Developers like Universal Audio, NeuralDSP, and Kilohearts have reported issues, and it's recommended to held off on updating until more information is available. The issue may affect various plug-ins, including those from SSL, UAD, and NeuralDSP. Some users also reported USB-C hub issues post-update. The last critical security update was 14.2.2, so users should only rush to update for security reasons.

card.title: Don't upgrade to macOS Sonoma 14.4 yet: plug-in compatibility issues - CDM Create Digital Music
card.description: macOS Sonoma remains stable, but a change reportedly related to AU plug-in validation in the recent 14.4 update can cause compatibility issues. With no significant reason to rush to upgrade, that means you should delay until plug-in developers have updates.

content: 衞玠始度江，見王大將軍。因夜坐，大將軍命謝幼輿。玠見謝，甚説之，都不復顧王，遂達旦微言。王永夕不得豫。玠體素羸，恆爲母所禁。爾夕忽極，於此病篤，遂不起。 （《世說新語·文學第四》）
